description: The Justia team proudly kicked off our 20th-anniversary celebrations this month! CEO Tim Stanley shared photos of the team's early days, and President Stacy Stern highlighted our achievements over the past two decades while expressing gratitude to all Justians. We look forward to continued work on our mission over the next 20 years!
Spring has sprung, and Zoey the Hug Pug thought you’d love to meet her friend Tona the Bunny :) He is almost 4 years old, loves eating fresh strawberries, and enjoys sleeping in.
